image_copyright: © Carl Barks / The Walt Disney Company
inscription: Inscribed in blue ink across top of drawing: Dear Mr. Walsh- Thank you for the/nice things you say about old Barks/ and us ducks. We wish there were/ lots of unpublished stories still/ on the drawing board but it's/ all bare
medium: Pen and blue ink on paper
provenance: Harry M. Walsh, St. Paul; given to MIA, 1985.
signed: in blue ink, LR: CARL BANKS
title: Donald Duck Seated at a Drawing Board
